translations: n.伤逝，哀悼；丧服；沉痛哀悼之情；恸哭（某些国家的人为哀悼死者而作的大声痛哭）
v.悼念，哀悼；对……感到痛心（遗憾）（mourn 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: She was still in mourning for her husband.
Yesterday the whole of Greece was in mourning.
The government announced a day of national mourning for the victims.
sentences.translation: 政府宣布全国为受害者哀悼一日。
